Yes, that's a great point. Instead of just making email easy, you could position EmailTru as a company that takes care of all your email needs for you. Here are a few slogans that convey that idea:

1. "EmailTru: Leave the email headaches to us"
2. "EmailTru: We take care of your email, so you don't have to"
3. "EmailTru: Email done for you"
4. "EmailTru: Email made effortless"
5. "EmailTru: We handle your email, so you can handle your business"
6. "EmailTru: Email made easy, we do it for you"
7. "EmailTru: One less thing to worry about"
8. "EmailTru: Your email handled, so you can focus on what matters"
9. "EmailTru: Email handled, so you can handle your business"
10. "EmailTru: Let us handle your email, so you can handle the rest"

These slogans are catchy and clearly convey the idea that EmailTru takes care of all your email needs for you, so you can focus on your business. This kind of messaging will be appealing to those who are looking for a full-service email agency that can handle all aspects of their email marketing.

Please let me know if there's anything else I can assist you with.
Please rewrite these in voice of comedian. Prioritize attention-grabbing and bold copy.

Sure, here are a few slogans that convey the idea that EmailTru takes care of all your email needs for you, in a more attention-grabbing and bold style, like a comedian's voice:

1. "EmailTru: We'll handle your email like it's our own, 'cause let's face it, no one likes a cluttered inbox"
2. "EmailTru: Your inbox's personal trainer, we'll whip it into shape"
3. "EmailTru: Let us handle your email, 'cause ain't nobody got time for that"
4. "EmailTru: Email done for you? Yes, please!"
5. "EmailTru: Leave the email drama to us, we'll handle it"
6. "EmailTru: We handle your email so you can handle your business, and a little bit of Netflix too"
7. "EmailTru: We'll handle your email like it's our own, 'cause ain't nobody got time for that"
8. "EmailTru: Email handled, so you can handle your business and a little bit of 'you' time"
9. "EmailTru: Let us handle your email, so you can handle the 'real' stuff"
10. "EmailTru: Email handled, so you can handle the important stuff like cat videos"

As you can see these slogans are bold, attention-grabbing and convey the idea that EmailTru takes care of all your email needs for you in a fun and playful way. This kind of messaging will be appealing to those who are looking for a full-service email agency that can handle all aspects of their email marketing and also have a sense of humor.

Please let me know if there's anything else I can assist you with.

EmailTru service does the following:

- writes emails that gets amazing engagement
- conveys your brand in the way you want
- sets up automations that work SMART for us
- grows the list FAST, gaining many new email subscribers to your list that are your perfect target reader

Please modify your slogans to convey this nuance

Sure, here are a few slogans that convey the idea that EmailTru not only takes care of all your email needs but also provides a high-quality service that can help grow your email list and improve engagement with your target audience:

8. "EmailTru: The email agency that grows your list and your business"
9. "EmailTru: The email agency that takes your brand to the next level"
10. "EmailTru: High-quality emails, high-quality growth"

These slogans convey the idea that EmailTru provides a high-quality service that not only takes care of all your email needs, but also helps grow your email list and improve engagement with your target audience. This kind of messaging will be appealing to those who are looking for a full-service email agency that can handle all aspects of their email marketing and also help them achieve their business goals.

These slogans convey the idea that EmailTru provides a hassle-free service that runs effortlessly and allows the client to focus on the core part of their business. This kind of messaging will be appealing to those who are looking for a full-service email agency that can handle all aspects of their email marketing without the need for them to put in the effort and still achieve great results.

I kinda like that idea of "email handled"
that's pretty interesting to me. 

It conveys a spirit of "hey, we got this. No worries."

Yes, "email handled" is a great slogan that conveys a spirit of "we got this" and "no worries" for the client. It emphasizes the idea that EmailTru takes care of all their email needs, which is a key selling point for the service. Here are a few more slogans that play off the "email handled" theme:

1. "EmailTru: Email handled, stress handled"
2. "EmailTru: Email handled, peace of mind"
3. "EmailTru: Email handled, business handled"
4. "EmailTru: Email handled, growth handled"
5. "EmailTru: Email handled, brand handled"
6. "EmailTru: Email handled, success handled"
7. "EmailTru: Email handled, focus on what matters"
8. "EmailTru: Email handled, sleep better"
9. "EmailTru: Email handled, business handled"
10. "EmailTru: Email handled, happiness handled"

These slogans convey the idea that EmailTru takes care of all your email needs and also takes care of other aspects that are important to the client, such as peace of mind, stress, growth, brand, success and even happiness. This kind of messaging will be appealing to those who are looking for a full-service email agency that can handle all aspects of their email marketing and also help them achieve a better quality of life.

Please let me know if there's anything else I can assist you with.
What is the definition of handled? And what are 5 synonyms?

The definition of "handled" is to take charge of, deal with, or manage something or someone. It can also mean to hold or touch something with the hand, or to use a tool or implement to work on something.

Here are 5 synonyms of "handled":

1. Managed - to take charge of, direct, or control
2. Dealt with - to take action in order to solve or address something
3. Controlled - to have power over something or someone
4. Governed - to exercise authority or rule over something or someone
5. Manipulated - to handle, control, or use something or someone for one's own purposes.

What about "Email handled, growth assured"

I like that idea, but it's a bit boring. 

Something like "email handled, growth guaranteed" is probably too big of a promise. 

Can you give me some ideas that fall in-between?

4. "EmailTru: Email handled, growth propelled"
5. "EmailTru: Email handled, growth intensified"

7. "EmailTru: Email handled, growth catalyzed"
8. "EmailTru: Email handled, growth turbocharged"
9. "EmailTru: Email handled, growth elevated"
10. "EmailTru: Email handled, growth amplified"

These slogans convey the idea that EmailTru takes care of all your email needs and also helps promote growth for your business in a more dynamic and powerful way, without making grandiose promises that can't be guaranteed.
